ygData.subject: Re: Where is a good place for a lvl 17 to hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: I recommend South Karanas for Aviaks, East Karanas for various beasts, or the Gorge of King Xorbb (Beholder) for Chasm and Gorge Minotaurs.  You can probably
ygData.messageBody:
I recommend South Karanas for Aviaks, East Karanas for various beasts, or the
Gorge of King Xorbb (Beholder) for Chasm and Gorge Minotaurs. You can probably
do some soloing in any of those three areas if a group is hard to find.

Narcissus of Povar


CMai wrote:

> Hello Everyone,
>
> I am a lvl 17 bard trying to find a good place to hunt. I am mostly around
> Oasis but willing to travel for exp and loot. I need a good place with
> decent amount of plp to group with. I tried Unrest, and Highpass. It seems
> that no one wants a bard because we attract too much attentions. Please
> give suggestions.
>
> Thnx,
> Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
> Hammerpaw and Samiam
> Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
